question.title: Solver config XML does not exist as a classpath resource
question.body:
I have a weird error in my project where the solver config XML file is not found even though it is 100% there.

When this line gets executed:

SolverFactory<ExamScheduleSolution> solverFactory =
        SolverFactory.createFromXmlResource("com/turki/examplanner/examSolverConfig.xml");

This error get thrown:

Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: The solverConfigResource (com/turki/examplanner/planner/examSolverConfig.xml) does not exist as a classpath resource in the classLoader (jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader@27f8302d).

Some facts:

  • The config XML file is located at src\main\resources\com\turki\examplanner\examSolverConfig.xml
  • src/main/resources is marked as “Resources” in the Project Structure.
  • When I rebuild the project, the xml file is also present at target\classes\com\turki\examplanner (so it should be found at run time)

examSolverConfig.xml

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<solver xmlns="https://www.optaplanner.org/xsd/solver" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
        xsi:schemaLocation="https://www.optaplanner.org/xsd/solver https://www.optaplanner.org/xsd/solver/solver.xsd">
    <solutionClass>com.turki.examplanner.solver.ExamScheduleSolution</solutionClass>
    <entityClass>com.turki.examplanner.solver.ExamAssignment</entityClass>
    <scoreDirectorFactory>    <constraintProviderClass>com.turki.examplanner.solver.ExamSchedulingConstraintProvider</constraintProviderClass>
    </scoreDirectorFactory>
    <termination>
        <secondsSpentLimit>30</secondsSpentLimit>
    </termination>
</solver>

question_comments.body: You don't give us the context, but if that calling code is in package com.turki.examplanner then check for the presence of file com/turki/examplanner/examSolverConfig.xml off the root of your target classes folder after compilation. If it's not in there, it won't work
@g00se starting with a leading / will throw an error saying I have to remove it.
